channel.title: Need a compiler
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was wondering if someone could post a compiler that you don't need any version of JDK for, I keep dling it, but it never saves, but I do have JRE and so I would appreciate if someone would post any compiler you don't need JDK for.
Another thing that would be helpful is if you could post the tutorial island coordinates lol, bye

item.title: Need a compiler
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Please just use javac to compile… =.="

Edit: Conor already posted it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a compiler
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“dragon39990, post:7, topic:341978”]You probally didn’t set your environment variables, or you didn’t set them correctly. Here is my compiler it works great but you have to make sure you have JDK downloaded, and for this compiler I don’t think you need to set your environment variables. MAKE SURE YOU NAME IT !compiler.bat OR IT WON’T WORK RIGHT.

@echo off :menu title Final Conquest compiler echo Welcome to Final Conquest compiler, By Dragon39990. echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors echo You need a } for every { echo Errors will show up if any below the line. echo ________________________________________________________________________________ echo Errors: echo ________________________________________________________________________________ if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. echo --------------------PRESS ANY BUTTON TO COMPILE AGAIN--By: Dragon39990 pause cls !compiler.bat pause

And also you don’t need to close it all you have to do is hit anybody while you are viewing it and it will recompile.[/quote]

Oh dear…Just set your environmental variables correctly and use javac:

@echo off javac.exe *.java pause

Simple yet the most effective.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a compiler
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:

[quote=“dragon39990, post:7, topic:341978”]You probally didn’t set your environment variables, or you didn’t set them correctly. Here is my compiler it works great but you have to make sure you have JDK downloaded, and for this compiler I don’t think you need to set your environment variables. MAKE SURE YOU NAME IT !compiler.bat OR IT WON’T WORK RIGHT.

@echo off :menu title Final Conquest compiler echo Welcome to Final Conquest compiler, By Dragon39990. echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors echo You need a } for every { echo Errors will show up if any below the line. echo ________________________________________________________________________________ echo Errors: echo ________________________________________________________________________________ if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. echo --------------------PRESS ANY BUTTON TO COMPILE AGAIN--By: Dragon39990 pause cls !compiler.bat pause

And also you don’t need to close it all you have to do is hit anybody while you are viewing it and it will recompile.[/quote]he/she was asking for a way to compile without JDK; next time read the question smart ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a compiler
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

You probally didn’t set your environment variables, or you didn’t set them correctly. Here is my compiler it works great but you have to make sure you have JDK downloaded, and for this compiler I don’t think you need to set your environment variables. MAKE SURE YOU NAME IT !compiler.bat OR IT WON’T WORK RIGHT.

@echo off :menu title Final Conquest compiler echo Welcome to Final Conquest compiler, By Dragon39990. echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors echo You need a } for every { echo Errors will show up if any below the line. echo ________________________________________________________________________________ echo Errors: echo ________________________________________________________________________________ if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Compiling Finished. echo --------------------PRESS ANY BUTTON TO COMPILE AGAIN--By: Dragon39990 pause cls !compiler.bat pause

And also you don’t need to close it all you have to do is hit anybody while you are viewing it and it will recompile.

Read full topic
